column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But to the larger point: If you ever have any issues with your food
column2: please let your server know and he or she will do everything within our power to make sure you are satisfied. Otherwise
column3: we are always happy to offer an alternative
column4: or we will gladly remove any item(s) from your tab. We live and die by our motto: "If it's not great
